## References

The following materials were used:

 * [Orchestrating Single-Cell Analysis with Bioconductor](https://osca.bioconductor.org)
 * [simpleSingleCell](https://bioconductor.org/packages/release/workflows/html/simpleSingleCell.html)
 * [A step-by-step workflow for low-level analysis of single-cell RNA-seq data with Bioconductor](https://f1000research.com/articles/5-2122)
 * [Analysis of single cell RNA-seq data](https://scrnaseq-course.cog.sanger.ac.uk/website/index.html)
